name: Strawberry Smoothie
description: This will taste like a strawberry shake if you use a banana that is truly ripe. Frozen strawberries will lend it a shake-like texture.
recipeCategory: breakfast, easy, quick, shakes and smoothies
keywords: banana, milk, strawberries, gluten-free, halal, healthy, high fiber, kosher, low cholesterol, nut-free, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 heaped cup fresh or frozen hulled strawberries

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Serve right away.
